item.title: Explore the Linear Mixed Effect Model
item.description: Why Ramdom Effect Models One-way classification with Rail example Rail Data Modeling Fitting the model with the package nlme Diagnostic Two-way classification: A Randomized Block Design egroStool: No Replications Modeling Diagnostic Machines: Replications Modeling Model Selection Extensions for interaction terms ANCOVA with random effects: Orthodont Modeling: Random Intercept Modeling: Random Intercept Predicitons Nested Classification Factors: Pixel Modeling Split-plot References: Pinheiro, J.
